comments:
How to reproduce:
 - create a project for something trivial like "Hello, World" - HelloWorld
 - try to debug (it works)
 - create another project (does not have to contain anything) - Bug
 - add this project to the build path of the HelloWorld
 - remove Bug project
 - try to debug HelloWorld - An internal error...

Error log:
Log: Wed Nov 14 15:28:11 EST 2001

How to fix:
 - manually remove reference to a phantom (Bug) project
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 5640 ***
